message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Is that something you'd be willing to do?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $92.50?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I think $115 is a fair price for this product. It's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, Alice, but $115 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $90?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $107.50. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, Alice, but $107.50 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $87.50?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $100, which is a fair price for this amazing product. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, Alice, but $100 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $85?
